name: Östergötland County Agriculture Society
obverse: A shield with the coat of arms of Östergötland County with a crown on top. The shield is flanked by agricultural tools and items.
reverse: A thick wreath encompasses the inscription. There is an empty space for the winner's name to be inscribed.
reverse_inscriptions: AF ÖSTERGÖTLANDS LÄNS K HUSHÅLLNINGS SÄLLSKAP TILL
description: This medal was meant to be issued as an award to attendees of the exhibition. This one was not awarded to anyone.
